title: Is this proof that Cody Simpson is The Masked Singer Australia's Robot? Does Miley Cryus songs
text:
He is currently dating Miley Cyrus.

And if the popular guesses are right, Cody Simpson is also the Robot on The Masked Singer Australia.

Speculation increased on Tuesday's episode of the show when the Robot performed a mash-up of Miley's hits.

Is this proof that Cody Simpson is The Masked Singer Australia's Robot? The performer did a mashup of Miley Cyrus hits on Tuesday's episode of the show

On the night, the Robot sang the pop star's hit Nothing Breaks Like A Heart mashed up with Jolene by Dolly Parton, who happens to be Miley's godmother.

However, Miley, 26, has also released her own powerful version of the song, during The Backyard Sessions in 2016.

That the Robot is such a fan of Miley, and knows her more obscure hits, could be proof it's indeed Cody.

Cody Simpson (right) is currently dating Miley Cyrus (left). The Robot sang the pop star's hit Nothing Breaks Like A Heart mashed up with Jolene by Dolly Parton

Her man? Miley has also released her own powerful version of Jolene, during The Backyard Sessions in 2016

Cody, 22, was in Australia in July, and is believed to have filmed his appearances on the singing competition at that time.

If it is the Aussie star, that would mean he was keenly showing his adoration for Miley before he split with Liam Hemsworth, which was announced in August.

Another clue came from Masked Singer Australia judge Lindsay Lohan, 33, who believed she recognised the Robot as being Cody - because he dated her sister, Ali Lohan, 25, last year.

Feels it in her waters! Another clue came from judge Lindsay Lohan (pictured) who believed she recognised the Robot as being Cody - because he dated her sister, Ali Lohan, 25

Lindsay said: 'It would be a really big throw-off if it was Cody 'cause he dated my sister for a long time. I feel like I know you and that's what scares me the most'

Former lovebirds: Ali Lohan (pictured) dated Cody last year

She said: 'Originally, I was thinking a Backstreet Boy and now I'm thinking it's Cody Simpson.

'Cody Simpson's very proactive in the ocean. And it would be a really big throw-off if it was Cody 'cause he dated my sister for a long time.'

Lindsay added: 'I feel like I know you and that's what scares me the most.'

In town: Cody was in Australia in July, and is believed to have filmed his appearances on the singing completion at that time

Last week, it was revealed Cody and Miley recently started dating, just months after she split from husband Liam Hemsworth.

On Friday, Cody revealed that he was 'very, very happy' with his pop star girlfriend.

'She's very passionate about what she does, and I'm very similar in that sense. That's why we get along so well,' he told People.
description: He is currently dating Miley Cyrus.
authors: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
